body.name: American Standard 288DA114.020 H2Optimum Two-Piece Toilet, Round Front, Standard Height, White, 1.1 gpf
features: CLEARS THE BOWL WITH JUST 1.1GPF/4.2LPF: This ultra-high efficiency toilet is the lowest water-consuming gravity flush toilet available for impressive water savings, the highest MaP (Maximum Performance) score of 1,000 grams, and is WaterSense certified
EASY TO CLEAN: EverClean surface inhibits the growth of unpleasant stain and odor-causing buildup
EVERY FLUSH CLEANS THE BOWL: A forceful rush of water from the PowerWash rim helps to scrub the bowl with every flush
INCLUDES: Chrome trip lever and color-matched bolt caps
SEAT IS SOLD SEPARATELY: Compatible with round front toilet seat
body.description: The H2Optimum Siphonic toilet is the highest water-saving gravity flush toilet available! With a flush rate of 1.1 gallons per flush, the H2Optimum will grant you maximum water savings, without compromising on great performance. Round front design saves space in smaller bathrooms. Features our revolutionary EverClean® surface inhibits the growth of stain and odor-causing bacteria, mold, and mildew on the surface for a toilet that stays cleaner, longer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Life. Love. Home. With the very best in kitchen and bathroom products, we are here to help make life at home happier, healthier, and simpler. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and performance has made us part of your everyday routine for nearly 150 years.

Time for a Bathroom Update? Start Here. Whether your bathroom is spacious or small, American Standard offers a superior line of toilets, faucets, sinks, bathtubs and accessories designed to turn heads.

Solutions for Everyday Living American Standard kitchen collections offer exceptional design and functionality. Encompassing faucets, sinks and accessories, there's a collection to satisfy every style and a product to meet every need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Next to my iPad, this is one of my greatest purchases. No post purchase regrets, with either of these products. The engineering that went into the design is apparent. The tall tank offers great potential energy in the water delivered to the flush ring. The flush ring water enters the bowl through the siphon jet, forcing the trapway (siphon) water over the hump to develop a powerful siphonic action. The siphonic action is amplified because of the 2” trapway. Next to a commercial toilet, this is the most powerful flushing toilet I’ve seen.I installed the toilet with the superior parts that came with it. Installation was simple and straight-forward. I appreciated the stainless steel tank bolts, Fluidmaster Fill Valve and Fluidmaster Flush Valve. These are time-tested and inexpensive replacement parts that work well. I used a simple wax seal to mount the toilet on a flange that was level with the tile floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these for my recent bathroom renovation. My contractor installed it for me and complemented on what great quality it was and how easy it was to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: It’s a nice toilet but..installing it myself I realized there’s a couple other things this doesn’t come with. The toilet needs a seal and gasket to connect with the flange. This does not come with the wax ring seal, the gasket to connect it, or a seat. Even know it’s clearly pictured with a seat. Still, worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only got half a toilet. Expensive, useless junk.
reviews.reviewText: I'm in the middle of fixing up my house. I bought this toilet last year, it came in a big box, and since I needed to tear out the rotten bathroom floor before installing the toilet, I set it to the side and didn't open the box until today. To my surprise, the big box was nearly empty, containing only a tiny box with the toilet tank inside, but no toilet bowl. I'm very angry. It was a lot of money to pay to receive only half a toilet, and I can't even buy the bowl anywhere, because they don't appear to sell it. I see that several other reviewers also got only one half, either the toilet tank or the bowl. If you buy, don't tell yourself they wont do the same to you, because they will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Toilet - Totally Underrated
reviews.reviewText: I manage a small apartment building. This toilet is great because of:1. 1.1 GPF2. Standard, simple flush mechanisms -- replacement parts can be found everywhere.3. Low cost.4. Good brand -- Am Std.My go-to toilet has been the American Standard Cadet 3 -- the 3 represents the 3 inch trapway between the tank and bowl.The Cadet 3 1.6 gpf was amazing and never ever clogged.The Cadet 3 1.28 gpf wasn't bad, but in reality is was really the 1.6 with less water in the tank. The problem was that a lot of water velocity was lost.This 1.1 gpf works great. It had to use a few a few tricks/tweaks vs the Cadet 3:1. The trapway is back to 2".2. The tank is narrower, forcing water in the tank to start at a higher level (potential energy state).3. The tank's flapper closes quickly, but you can hold it down for flushing "bigger loads".4. The bowl's waterway is a little more constricted so that it requires less water.5. You can see the other design features on the American Standard website.Overall these tweaks create great water pressure/flow/suction. It's really quite impressive.If you need a more water, just hold down the flush handle a few extra seconds -- no big deal.Tips for you installers:1. Don't use the included Fluidmaster fill valve. Buy a Korky Platinum. It's much better.2. Buy your own seat.3. Buy the Fluidmaster Better Than Wax seal.4. Don't forget to use shims to make sure the toilet is secure.I say this toilet is underrated because it is a special-order item at Home Depot. If people saw it in the store, I think it would ruin the sales of the other more expensive toilets.I am wary of fancy dual-flush toilet mechanisms. One single plumber phone call can ruin all the money saved by using less water. KISS - Keep It Simple Stupid is my motto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sad I had to move and leave it behind
reviews.reviewText: Worked great. Hooked up a bidet to it as well. Well, I had someone install it all for me. I wish I still lived in that house. Toilet was a good purchase and it was real cool to get it delivered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Well made good value as a custom home builder I have seen some very poor products.this is well made, heavy built, arrive in good condition well packaged, I will buy it again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price, excellent performance
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and install following instructions. Some plumbing experience and knowledge is helpful. The hardest part was unpacking and getting rid of the packing material and cardboard!
No me gusto para nada este escusado por qué la imagen que vi cuando lo compre incluía la tapa del escusado
